Command.label: Command
Command.tooltip: The command that will be responded to.

CurrencyName.label: Currency Name
CurrencyName.tooltip: The name of the new currency

PriceUpdateFrequency.label: Price Update Timer
PriceUpdateFrequency.tooltip: How often the turnip price will update.

PriceUpdateUnit.label: Unit
PriceUpdateUnit.tooltip: The unit of time for the Price Update Timer.

MinValue.label: Min Value
MinValue.tooltip: The minimum random cost of the turnips.

MaxValue.label: Max Value
MaxValue.tooltip: The maximum random cost of the turnips.

Cooldown.label: Cooldown (seconds)
Cooldown.tooltip: How long the command should go on cooldown for

HelpMessage.value: Hey ${user}, check out the Turnips readme for help: https://github.com/OctahedronV2/Turnips/blob/main/README.md
HelpMessage.label: Help Message
HelpMessage.tooltip: The message that is sent when the help command is run.

CooldownMessage.value: You are on cooldown for this command for another: ${cooldown}
CooldownMessage.label: Cooldown Message
CooldownMessage.tooltip: The message that is sent when the user is still on cooldown.

BalanceMessage.label: Balance Check Message
BalanceMessage.tooltip: The message that is sent when the balance command is ran.

ValueMessage.value: Turnips are currently worth ${turnipValue}! This price will update in: ${timeUntilPriceUpdate}
ValueMessage.label: Turnip Value Message
ValueMessage.tooltip: The message that is sent when the value command is ran.

BuyMessage.label: Turnip Buy Message
BuyMessage.tooltip: The message that is sent when the buy command is successful.

TooExpensiveMessage.value: You cannot afford that many turnips.
TooExpensiveMessage.label: Too Expensive Message
TooExpensiveMessage.tooltip: The message that is sent when the balance command is ran.

SellMessage.label: Sell Message
SellMessage.tooltip: The message that is sent when the sell command is successful.

NotEnoughTurnipsMessage.value: You do not have that many turnips.
NotEnoughTurnipsMessage.label: Not Enough Turnips Message
NotEnoughTurnipsMessage.tooltip: The message that is sent when the user tries to sell more turnips than they have.

InvalidAmountMessage.value: That is not a valid amount.
InvalidAmountMessage.label: Invalid Amount Message
InvalidAmountMessage.tooltip: The message that is sent when the user puts in an invalid amount for any command.

PriceUpdateMessage.value: Turnip prices have updated! New price: ${turnipValue}
PriceUpdateMessage.label: Price Update Message
PriceUpdateMessage.tooltip: The message that is sent when the turnip price updates.
